extension_desc.message: It translates selected text and displays translated text by notification pop-up.

max_gt_text_length.message: The length of your selected text must be less than 5000 chars.
max_gt_text_length.description: Max length accepted by Google Translate to translate

tt_start.description: Text when a translation is displayed

enabled_title.description: Title when the translation is enabled

disabled_title.description: Title when the translation is disabled
